Articles.Content: New to the forums, but been with KSP since .18 I think. 31 retired military, with a passion for rockets and putting little kerbins into stable EVA solar orbits. And "forgetting" to bring them home:D

*Chuckles at the solar orbit thing*

Welcome to the forums!

Yeah I still do that. Mostly just modules for my mun base that I forgot to put solar panels on end up in a nice stable orbit around the sun. Its good fun watching them get caught by Duna or Eve in high warp.

Have fun and don't forget to ask questions when you get flummoxed by anything!

Tweety

Welcome!

The forums are Very helpful with any questions you might have.

Have fun!

hey, just get time control, and hyper warp till they encounter Kerbin again!

Anywho, welcome to the forums. Also, thank you for your service.
